outfit_data.top: A crimson silk blouse with a fitted bodice, cinched waist, and flared sleeves ending in delicate cuffs.  The neckline features a modest high collar with delicate gold buttons fastening it at the back.
outfit_data.bottom: Emerald wool gabardine trousers tailored for a bodycon fit. The pants feature a high waist and straight legs, culminating in slightly cropped hems that reveal a hint of ankle.
outfit_data.shoes: Cobalt blue satin pumps with a pointed toe and a stiletto heel. They are adorned with gold buckles at the ankles for an extra touch of vintage glamour.
outfit_data.extras: A single strand of pearl necklace adds a timeless elegance to the ensemble.  A small, structured handbag in black leather completes the look, offering a chic and practical complement.
